org.lafayette.server.domain.mapper

Class UserMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lafayette.server.domain.mapper.BaseMapper<User>
      • org.lafayette.server.domain.mapper.UserMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Mapper<User>, UserFinder

    public class UserMapper
extends BaseMapper<User>
implements UserFinder
    Maps user domain objects to the database.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter
